H0.text: when did ireland gain its independence from england. 1801

H1.text: when did ireland gain its independence from england. 1848

H2.text: when did ireland gain its independence from england. 1867

H3.text: when did ireland gain its independence from england. 1922

A4.text: The Irish Free State was established in December 1922 under the Anglo-Irish Treaty of December 1921.

A5.text: The Statute of Westminster in 1931 granted the Irish Free State internationally recognised independence.

A6.text: The Irish Free State came into existence on 6 December 1922 by a royal proclamation.

A7.text: The Anglo-Irish Treaty of 1921 provided for the establishment of the Irish Free State within a year.
